    Adam Sandler (I)

    Actor | Producer | Writer
    STARmeter
    Top 500
    Up 76 this week
    View rank on IMDbPro »
    Adam Richard Sandler was born September 9, 1966 in Brooklyn, New York, to Judith (Levine), a teacher at a nursery school, and Stanley Alan Sandler, an electrical engineer. He is of Russian Jewish descent. At 17, he took his first step towards becoming a stand-up comedian when he spontaneously took the stage at a Boston comedy club. He found he was... See full bio »

    Born:

    September 9, 1966 in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
